meanings.definition: Against or in opposition to octaves.
meanings.sent1: She placed her music stand contraoctaves to the piano.
meanings.sent2: The two teams played contraoctaves to determine the winner.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat contraoctaves to the dog, daring it to chase.
meanings.sent4: The siblings always stood contraoctaves in their opinions on bedtime.
meanings.sent5: The students sat contraoctaves to the teacher, eager to learn.

meanings.definition: A musical interval spanning eight diatonic scale degrees.
meanings.sent1: The song featured a beautiful contraoctaves that resonated throughout the hall.
meanings.sent2: The musician played the challenging contraoctaves flawlessly.
meanings.sent3: The contraoctaves in the melody added a unique twist to the composition.
meanings.sent4: His voice soared in the contraoctaves, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The contraoctaves created a sense of depth and richness in the music.
